DOC.brief_title: Lubricant Versus Lidocaine Gel Pain Control During Urodynamics
DOC.detailed_description: The evaluation incontinent patient usually include catheterization post void residual urinary volume , cotton tip swab test , urodynamic testing . All evaluation require manipulation urethra either catheter cotton tip swab . To minimize discomfort , water base lubricant 2 % lidocaine gel often use ease passage device urethra . In 2008 , Harmanli et al . perform randomized control trial show use 2 % lidocaine gel significantly decrease pain cotton tip swab test catheterization . However , data look cystourethroscopy woman suggest 2 % lidocaine gel little relieve discomfort lubricant alone . There study look whether 2 % lidocaine gel decrease pain associated multichannel urodynamic testing compare use lubricant alone . The purpose study determine difference patient report pain level , , multichannel urodynamics patient treat 2 % lidocaine gel water base lubricant . We hypothesize lidocaine gel decrease pain level compare lubricant gel . This study design prospective double blind randomize control trial . Participants randomize 2 % lidocaine gel lubricant gel group inform consent obtain immediately undergoing multichannel urodynamics . Sequentially numbered seal opaque envelope contain identity study arm use randomization . The urogynecology clinic nurse prepare select gel ( either 2 % lidocaine gel water base lubricant ) procedure field without identification . Since gel look identical , examiner patient blind assigned arm . The participant undergo standard clinic exam standardize order , consist perineal/vulvar sensation exam , measurement post void residual , cotton tip swab test , pelvic organ prolapse quantification measurement , pelvic exam speculum , bi-manual exam , multichannel urodynamic testing . The study gel apply red robinson catheter catheterization , cotton tip swab , bladder catheter multichannel urodynamic study . The participant ask pain level specific point ( start exam , placement bladder catheter , immediately completion study , 30 minute completion study ) use Wong-Baker pain scale . At conclusion procedure , participant give short survey complete expectation procedure pain level . The practitioner/investigator also give short survey complete end examination ass idea patient 's comfort level procedure . Data enter database analysis use independent sample test , Mann-Whitney U test , chi square test . We specifically use Lidocaine Hydrochloride Jelly USP , 2 % Surgilube ( Savage Laboratories ) . Surgilube water base lubricate gel use gynecologic exam . It available 5g individually wrap sterile packet . Lidocaine gel also readily available use gynecologic clinic , available 5ml individually wrap sterile packet . Both clear , viscous , odorless , gel visually identical . Currently use standard urogynecologic exam , depend operator preference . All patient schedule urodynamic testing invited participate .
DOC.criteria: Women 18 year age old Scheduled undergo multichannel urodynamic study Able give inform consent Able read write English Spanish Any contraindication multichannel urodynamic study Allergy water base lubricant lidocaine Any active pelvic low urinary tract infection
